duck: Recording consciousness - Bennett describes the development of recording consciousness, the consequence of "a society which is literally wired for sound" in which, according to Middleton "this consciousness defines the s...
Writing - Writing is language in a textual medium through the use of a set of signs or symbols (known as a writing system).
Recordings (album) - Recordings is a compilation album by British progressive rock band Porcupine Tree, first released in May 2001.
Sound recording - Sound recording and reproduction is an electrical or mechanical inscription and re-creation of sound waves, such as spoken voice, singing, instrumental music, or sound effects.

Recording (real estate) - The vast majority of states in the United States employ a system of recording legal instruments that affect the title of real estate as the exclusive means for publicly documenting land titles a...

Recording is the process of capturing data or translating information to a recording format stored on some storage medium, which is often referred to as a record or, if an auditory medium, a recording.

wiki.text:
'Recording' is the process of capturing data or translating information to a
recording format stored on some storage medium, which is often referred to as a
'record' or, if an auditory medium, a recording.
wiki.title: recording
